product_name: The North Face K Jacket - Women's
long_description: You'll stay comfortable on your daily commute in wet, windy weather when you wear The North Face K jacket. It's waterproof, windproof and has an adjustable, removable hood to keep you covered.
short_description: You'll stay comfortable on your daily commute in wet, windy weather when you wear The North Face K jacket. It's waterproof, windproof and has an adjustable, removable hood to keep you covered.
